titleInfo.title: 'File J/32 Payments of compensation amounts to Bahrain subjects'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 20; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-13; these numbers are written in pencil or crayon, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains claims and receipts of compensation made to families and heirs of victims of industrial accidents. The bulk of the claims are made around incidents occurring in Bahrain's new industries related to shipping and oil extraction. Of note are particularly detailed accounts of violent and lethal incidents, and ensuing compensation paid towards the end of the file (ff 14-18).
